about_the_game:
Need more One Last Time? Here is a set of 10 exclusive puzzles you can print off at home and complete with your trusty pen. Still not enough? How about 15 digital wallpapers to replace your desktop background with? STILL not enough? Too bad. That's it. Unless you want to complete the game all over again, that's all there is.

Contains

  • 10 exclusive puzzles to print off and do at home.
  • 15 digital wallpapers to put as your desktop background.

Click on One Last Time in your Library. Open the Properties and click on the Local Files tab. Open the Local Files and there will be a folder called Admirer Pack that contains the puzzles and wallpapers.

name: One Last Time - Admirer Pack
short_description: Printable puzzles to do at home and digital wallpapers to personalize your desktop with.
